definition: having or arising from a benefice, the semantic role of the intended recipient who benefits from the happening denoted by the verb in the clause
details:
adjective
- having or arising from a benefice
= example: having or arising from a benefice
noun
- the semantic role of the intended recipient who benefits from the happening denoted by the verb in the clause
= synonyms: benefactive role
- the recipient of funds or other benefits
= synonyms: donee
